author: By Karla Cripps and Yuli Yang, CNN
title: Wuhan's beautiful cherry blossoms captured in stunning drone footage
description: Wuhan's cherry blossom trees are in full bloom right now, providing the Chinese city with a much needed message of hope and renewal as it readies to reopen following two months in lockdown.
content:
Karla Cripps and Yuli Yang, CNNPublished 26th March 2020
(CNN) Though mainly associated with Japan, cherry blossom season is a widely anticipated event in cities around the world, a sign that spring has arrived, an opportunity for people to get out and enjoy… [+1830 chars]
